name: emi.ui
description: The emi-ui is a suite of clients and APIs that users and applications can use to access grid services
releaseNotes:
What's new

    * This is the first release of the emi-ui containing clients from ARC, dCache, gLite, UNICORE



Specific news:

    * ARC Clients: - ARC Clients in EMI-1 "Kebnekaise" release is a major step forward with respect to previous releases, as it completes migration to the new code base. With this release the ng* clients are replaced by the arc* clients.

    * dCache clients:

          o SRM - Added SRM_JAVA_OPTIONS="-Xms64m -Xmx64m"

          o dCap - Packaging number now matches code version.



Deployment notes:

    * Installation using "yum install emi-ui", configuration using "path-to-yaim/yam -c -s /site-info.def -n UI"



Known Issues

    * before using lcg-* commands: # export CSEC_NOTHREAD=1
changeLog: Put the Change logs here (multiline field)
